channel.title: Looking for developers and testers
channel.description:
Hello I am looking for developers that can code a 667 revision RSPS. I am looking for experienced coders. You will get paid for doing some work. Not looking for dedicated coders. Also I am not going to be paying you a lot as well, eventually I will depending on how the server is progressing.
Testers: I am looking for testers that can find bugs on the server. This isn't going to be a paying job.
Add me on skype: colddaysrsps

item.title: Looking for developers and testers
item.dc:creator: @Sessy_Pk3r Sessy Pk3r
item.description:
@Sessy_Pk3r wrote:

Can you post more information? What’s the current progress of the server? How are you contributing beyond financing? “Experienced” coders is too broad. Do you want front-end or back-end developers? What kind of version control are you using? How anyone expects to get reliable help by posting brief and broad threads is beyond me.

I think we need moderators to clean this section up and hold the threads on this board to a higher standard. But then again, it’s just my opinion.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for developers and testers
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

Also I am not going to be paying you a lot as well,

At least you’re honest.

Read full topic
